name: Sneaky Pete - #1GAM
description:
The Streets are patrolled by police, search lights and helicopters are actively scanning the upper floors. Steal all that you can and make it to back to your hideout without being caught.

Find at least 1 out of 3 valuables
Escape through the broken Window while dodging Police Patrols and Search Lights

Be sure to lookout for highlighted objects to hide inside of

Controls

Move - WASD
Jump - Space
Hide - H
Run - R
Restart - Enter
